name: Knights Out
description:
Created For DaftJam 2021 - Elympics Edition, mighe be taken down at any moment

Fight With Your Friend In This Post-Apo Sci-Fi World Ruled By A Cow With A Jetpack

How to slap:
-Move With Left Stick or WSAD

-Rotate With Right Stick or Arrows 

-Dash with Left Trigger or Left Shift

-Charge up your epic slap!  Hold Right Trigger Or Space LONGER = STRONGER

Gameplay Trailer

Credits:

-Programming/Networking: HACAH
-Additional Programming/ 2d/3d Art: Kubstoff
-Design: Matthewtheundead
-VFX: Enigma
-Sounds: Sepci0
